product.title: Infinitipro by Conair 3-in-1 Styling Hair Dryer, 1875W Hair Dryer And 3 Attachments For A Wide Variety Of Looks SD11GNX
product.description: Detangle. Straighten. Volumize. Plus, get heat protection and shiny, frizz-free hair. Do it all with the 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Ionic Dryer from InfinitiPRO by Conair.® This versatile styling essential is your go-to for salon results and all-in-one styling at home. Get personalized results with 3 unique attachments. Use the bristle brush for easy styling. Get maximum control with the dual-row comb for straight styles. Or use the wide-tooth thermal comb for the superior heat transfer you need for sleek, smooth styles. A locking button lets you rest assured that the attachments are securely in place as you style. Want smooth, shiny hair? Ionic technology gets it done with up to 75% less frizz.* You'll dry fast with less damage because ceramic technology protects your hair with gentle infrared heat. Choose from 3 heat and 2 speed settings to get your look just right with the perfect speed and heat for your hair type. The handle is designed to fit comfortably in your hand and make styling extra easy and comfortable. Salon performance made easy! *When compared to hair dryers with natural ion generation.

product.description_full:
Detangle. Straighten. Volumize. Plus, get heat protection and shiny, frizz-free hair. Do it all with the 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Ionic Dryer from InfinitiPRO by Conair.® This versatile styling essential is your go-to for salon results and all-in-one styling at home. Get personalized results with 3 unique attachments. Use the bristle brush for easy styling. Get maximum control with the dual-row comb for straight styles. Or use the wide-tooth thermal comb for the superior heat transfer you need for sleek, smooth styles. A locking button lets you rest assured that the attachments are securely in place as you style. Want smooth, shiny hair? Ionic technology gets it done with up to 75% less frizz.* You'll dry fast with less damage because ceramic technology protects your hair with gentle infrared heat. Choose from 3 heat and 2 speed settings to get your look just right with the perfect speed and heat for your hair type. The handle is designed to fit comfortably in your hand and make styling extra easy and comfortable. Salon performance made easy! *When compared to hair dryers with natural ion generation. * One Step Style and Dry: This 3-in-1 Styling System features three attachments to achieve the perfect look. Features 3 heat settings and 2-speed settings and a cool shot button to lock styles into place
 * Versatile Use: Includes three attachments for a variety of looks and styles: Bristle Styling Brush, Dual-Row Straightening Comb, and Thermal Wide-Tooth Detangling Comb. Lock Button keeps attachments in place while styling
 * Innovative Design: This styler features Ionic and tourmaline ceramic technology that helps protect hair from heat while adding shine and decreasing frizz by up to 75%. Hinged filter for easy maintenance
 * Leader in Hair Dryers: From traditional bonnets to hi-tech dryers equipped with cutting-edge technology, Conair has a great selection of hair dryers for every hair type and every hairstyle
 * Conair Hair Care: Since 1959, we have made innovative small appliances, hair styling tools, and more. Our haircare line includes high-quality hair dryers, brushes, styling tools, and hair accessories
product.description_full_html:
Detangle. Straighten. Volumize. Plus, get heat protection and shiny, frizz-free hair. Do it all with the 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Ionic Dryer from InfinitiPRO by Conair.® This versatile styling essential is your go-to for salon results and all-in-one styling at home. Get personalized results with 3 unique attachments. Use the bristle brush for easy styling. Get maximum control with the dual-row comb for straight styles. Or use the wide-tooth thermal comb for the superior heat transfer you need for sleek, smooth styles. A locking button lets you rest assured that the attachments are securely in place as you style. Want smooth, shiny hair? Ionic technology gets it done with up to 75% less frizz.* You'll dry fast with less damage because ceramic technology protects your hair with gentle infrared heat. Choose from 3 heat and 2 speed settings to get your look just right with the perfect speed and heat for your hair type. The handle is designed to fit comfortably in your hand and make styling extra easy and comfortable. Salon performance made easy! *When compared to hair dryers with natural ion generation.
  • One Step Style and Dry: This 3-in-1 Styling System features three attachments to achieve the perfect look. Features 3 heat settings and 2-speed settings and a cool shot button to lock styles into place
  • Versatile Use: Includes three attachments for a variety of looks and styles: Bristle Styling Brush, Dual-Row Straightening Comb, and Thermal Wide-Tooth Detangling Comb. Lock Button keeps attachments in place while styling
  • Innovative Design: This styler features Ionic and tourmaline ceramic technology that helps protect hair from heat while adding shine and decreasing frizz by up to 75%. Hinged filter for easy maintenance
  • Leader in Hair Dryers: From traditional bonnets to hi-tech dryers equipped with cutting-edge technology, Conair has a great selection of hair dryers for every hair type and every hairstyle
  • Conair Hair Care: Since 1959, we have made innovative small appliances, hair styling tools, and more. Our haircare line includes high-quality hair dryers, brushes, styling tools, and hair accessories

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
